items.content_html: A lightweight Web3 learning platform combining bite-sized lessons (5-10 mins) with a decentralized currency knowledge hub. Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.

Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.

items.content_html: Type-safe and runtime-safe environment variable validator for Node.js, frontend frameworks (React, Vue, Svelte), and serverless environments. Validate, parse, and type your env variables easily with support for URLs, ports, enums, and default values. Lightweight, production-ready, and fully TypeScript-supported.

Validate, parse, and type your env variables easily with support for URLs, ports, enums, and default values. Lightweight, production-ready, and fully TypeScript-supported.
